page.title: 05EDUCATION - Continued
page.content: The Secondary Modern whose head is{Mrs {A. Pinion}and deputy head{Mr A. {Wilbourn}has 442 pupils, 22 teachers and about 64 children come from primaries each year. The school was built in 1931, it was built at different times. The school used to be on West Street, it was called the National School. The school used to be a nursery school. Alford County Primary whose acting headmaster is{Mr H. Duncalfe}has 306 pupils and about 30 pupils in each class, there are 11 teachers. The school was built in 1968, it was built at different times. The children come from Alford and district, they come by bus, car, bicycle and some walk. The school has no benefactors. During the next few years the secondary education in Alford will be changed completely.
